transArray.content: Next to the subway, transportation is convenient.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road and Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, allowing you to have a worry-free trip. I'm glad to hear about your positive impression of our hotel in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct room rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. It is our responsibility to provide you with high-quality services. Thank you for your support to us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects and believe that you will have a better stay experience next time you check in. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
